ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] intelligent weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder if the weapons will like refuse to fight? Or if they will actually hit better or something. I wish there was a way to upgrade epic weapons (other than
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder if the weapons will like refuse to fight? Or if they will actually hit better or something. I wish there was a way to upgrade epic weapons (other than adding an augment stone). I would love for my Water Sprinkler of Nem Ankh to have better speed and damage. Or even a proc of some kind. You'd think that bc it's epic it would have better features. Although I can't complain about the rez.
luv,
-Su
